page.title: 10HUMSHAUGH CLUBS
page.content: THE VILLAGE HALL IS THE CENTRE FOR MANY ACTIVITEIS COVERING ALL AGE GROUPS. THE ART GROUP MEETS REGULARLY AS DOES THE UNDER FIVES PLAYGROUP, {YOUTH CLUB}AND BADMINTON TEAMS. CUBS, BROWNIES, GUIDES AND RANGERS STILL THRIVE IN THE AREA TAKING PART IN NATIONAL ACTIVITIES LIKE BRINGING A FLAME FROM BUCKINGHAM PALACE TO EACH COMPANY TO CELEBRATE 75 YEARS OF GUIDING. AN OVER 60 CLUB, THE GOOD COMPANIONS, MEETS IN THE AFTERNOON TO LISTEN TO A SPEAKER AND HAVE TEA. THERE IS A MIXED CHOIR, MOTHERS' UNION, RED CROSS ASSOCIATES GROUP AND A WOMEN'S INSTITUTE MEETS MONTHLY AS IT HAS DONE FOR OVER 50 YEARS; THE MEMBERS TAKING A KEEN INTEREST IN LOCAL AND NATIONAL EVENTS. THE{CRICKET AND{FOOTBALL}TEAMS PRACTISE REGULARLY AND ARE PLAYING WELL. THE ANNUAL LEEK SHOW PROVIDES A GARDENING INTEREST.
